MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers in the ML7 postcode area of Shotts. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:45PM due to repairs required on the underground cable network on Broomhill Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and safely as possible by 6pm. We will update messages with any additional information as quickly as we can. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:25PM on 30 January 2021
